result.title: 2009 Defra MB0102 2A Ice Limit layer
result.name: 2009-defra-mb0102-2a-ice-limit-layer
result.notes: Maximum lateral extent of the British and Irish Ice Sheet during the last glacial period (c.80 - 20 000 years ago). Obtained from the digitization of a georeferenced map. This dataset is associated with a series of digital maps/spatial information layers that are designed to help identify Marine Conservation Zones (MCZs) in UK waters. (see Project MB0102: 'Accessing and developing the required biophysical datasets and datalayers for Marine Protected Areas network planning and wider marine spatial planning purposes' - Report No.8, Task 2a Mapping of Geological and Geomorphological Features)

extras.value: ["Full resolution GIS layer only for viewing by MB0102 partners with publicly available layers available at 10km resolution."]

Full resolution data layer for use only within the MB0102 contract. Permission required from data originators for use in any other context, or by non MB0102 partners. 10km resolution data layer freely available under Open Government Licence.
Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs (DEFRA) (originator, custodian)

organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
